name: CreateTrelloPluginListing
description:
Create a new listing for a Trello Power-Up.

This tool creates a new listing for a Trello Power-Up in a specified locale. Use this tool when you need to add a new entry for a Power-Up on Trello's platform.

parameters.name: power_up_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Power-Up for which you are creating a new listing.

value_schema.description: The ID of the Power-Up for which you are creating a new listing.

parameters.name: locale_description
parameters.description: The description for the Power-Up listing in the specified locale.

value_schema.description: The description to show for the given locale

parameters.name: listing_locale
parameters.description: The specific locale code (e.g., 'en-US') for which the listing should be displayed.

value_schema.description: The locale that this listing should be displayed for.

parameters.name: overview_for_locale
parameters.description: The overview text to display for the specified locale. Provide a concise summary relevant to the plugin.

value_schema.description: The overview to show for the given locale.

parameters.name: plugin_locale_name
parameters.description: The name for the Power-Up listing in the specified locale.

value_schema.description: The name to use for the given locale.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.

parameters.name: idPlugin
parameters.description: The ID of the Power-Up for which you are creating a new listing.

value_schema.description: The ID of the Power-Up for which you are creating a new listing.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description to show for the given locale

value_schema.description: The description to show for the given locale

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale that this listing should be displayed for.

value_schema.description: The locale that this listing should be displayed for.

parameters.name: overview
parameters.description: The overview to show for the given locale.

value_schema.description: The overview to show for the given locale.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name to use for the given locale.

value_schema.description: The name to use for the given locale.
